instructions: Download and install eBuddy.lock from the app store for your device. Open the app, then tap Terms & Privacy Policy to read the user agreement or tap Continue . Tap Continue to allow access to your contacts and media files. Tap Allow if prompted to grant further access to your device files. Enter your phone number, select Next , then enter the verification code sent to your device. Enter the name you want others to see while chatting, then tap Finish .
